data.name: TermsAndConditionText
data.value:
These Terms of Use (hereinafter referred to as "Terms of Use") are referred to as _____ (hereinafter referred to as "Company"). .. ) Use of the service provided on this website (hereinafter referred to as "this service") It sets the conditions. For registered users (hereinafter referred to as "users"), this book Please use this service in accordance with the terms. Article 1 (Applicable) 1. This agreement applies to all relationships related to the use of this service between the user and our company. Suppose. 2. Regarding this service, in addition to this agreement, various rules such as rules for use (hereinafter Below, it is called "individual regulation". ) May be done. These individual provisions have no name Regardless of this, it shall form part of this agreement. 3. If the provisions of this agreement contradict the provisions of the individual provisions of the preceding article, special provisions will be made in the individual provisions. Unless otherwise specified, the provisions of the individual provisions shall prevail. Article 2 (Registration for use) 4. In this service, the applicant for registration agrees to this agreement and uses it by the method specified by our company. Registration is completed by applying for registration and our company notifying the applicant for registration of this approval. You and shall. 5. If we determine that the applicant for usage registration has the following reasons, we will approve the application for usage registration. In some cases, we shall not be obliged to disclose the reason. a. When false matters are reported when applying for usage registration b. When the application is from a person who has violated this agreement c. In addition, when we judge that the usage registration is not appropriate Article 3 (Management of user ID and password) 6. The user properly manages the user ID and password of this service at his / her own risk. I shall make sense. 7. In any case, the user transfers or lends the user ID and password to a third party. However, it cannot be shared with a third party. We have a user ID and password pair If the match is logged in with the same registration information, the user ID is registered. It is considered to be used by the user himself. 8. Damage caused by the use of user ID and password by a third party is ours. The Company shall not be liable at all unless there is intentional or gross negligence. Article 4 (Usage fee and payment method) 9. The user shall be separately determined by the Company as consideration for the paid part of this service and listed on this website. The usage fee shown shall be paid by the method specified by the Company. 10. If the user delays the payment of the usage fee, the user will lose the delay at a rate of 14.6% per year. You shall pay the damage. Article 5 (Prohibited matters) The user must not do the following acts when using this service. 11. Acts that violate laws or public order and morals 12. Acts related to criminal acts 13. Features of our company, other users of the Service, or third party servers or networks Acts of destroying or interfering 14. Actions that may interfere with the operation of our services 15. Acts of collecting or accumulating personal information about other users
16. Unauthorized access or attempting this 17. Acts of impersonating another user 18. Acts that directly or indirectly benefit antisocial forces in connection with our services 19. Intellectual property rights, portrait rights, privacy, name of our company, other users of this service or third parties Acts that infringe on honor or other rights or interests 20. Posting or sending on this service the content that we judge to include or include the following expressions Act of believing Overly violent expression b. Explicit sexual expression c. Expressions that lead to discrimination based on race, nationality, beliefs, gender, social status, family origin, etc. d. Expressions that induce or encourage suicide, self-harm, or substance abuse e. Expressions that make others uncomfortable, including other antisocial content 21. Actions that the Company determines to have or are intended for the following: Business, advertising, advertising, solicitation, and other commercial activities (excluding those approved by the Company) vinegar. ) b. Acts aimed at sexual or obscene acts c. Acts aimed at meeting or dating an unfamiliar opposite sex d. Acts aimed at harassing or slandering other users e. Causes disadvantage, damage or discomfort to us, other users of the Service, or third parties Acts aimed at f. Other acts of using this service for a purpose different from the intended purpose of use of this service 22. Religious activities or solicitations to religious groups 23. Other acts that the Company deems inappropriate Article 6 (suspension of provision of this service, etc.) 24. The Company shall not notify the user in advance if it determines that there is any of the following reasons. It is possible to suspend or suspend the provision of all or part of this service. When performing maintenance, inspection or updating of the computer system related to this service b. It is difficult to provide this service due to force majeure such as earthquakes, lightning strikes, fires, power outages or natural disasters. When becomes c. When the computer or communication line stops due to an accident d. In addition, when we judge that it is difficult to provide this service 25. We would like the user or a third party to suffer due to the suspension or interruption of the provision of this service. We shall not be liable for any disadvantage or damage. Article 7 (copyright) 26. The user owns the necessary intellectual property rights such as copyright, or obtains the permission of the necessary right holder. Use this service only for information such as obtained sentences, images and videos, and post or upload Suppose you can 27. Writings, images, videos, etc. posted or uploaded by users using this service The right shall be reserved by the user or other existing right holder. However, this The company uses this service to post or upload texts, images, videos, etc. , Improvement of this service, improvement of quality, correction of deficiencies, etc. and publicity of this service, etc. It shall be possible to use it to the extent necessary for the user, and the user shall exercise the moral rights of the author regarding this use. It shall not be used. 28. Except as provided in the main text of the preceding paragraph, regarding this service and all information related to this service. All copyrights and other intellectual property rights are the rights that we or our company have licensed to use. Reproduction, transfer, loan, translation, modification, reprint, public transmission (transmission possible) Includes activation. ), Transmission, distribution, publication, commercial use, etc. shall not be performed.
Article 8 (Usage restrictions and deregistration) 29. We will post data without prior notice if the user falls under any of the following: Delete and restrict the use of all or part of this service to the user or the user It is possible to cancel the registration as. a. Violation of any provision of these Terms b. If the registration is found to be false c. When the credit card notified by the user as a payment method is suspended. d. In case of default of payment obligations such as fees e. If you do not receive a response from us for a certain period of time f. When this service has not been used for a certain period of time since the last use g. In addition, when we judge that the use of this service is not appropriate 30. If any of the items in the preceding paragraph is applicable, the user will naturally be liable for all debts to the Company. You lose the profit of the deadline, and you have to repay all the debts you incur at that time in a lump sum immediately. Must be. 31. The Company shall be liable for any damages caused to the user due to the actions taken by the Company based on this article. I will not take charge. Article 9 (withdrawal) The user shall be able to withdraw from this service by the withdrawal procedure specified by the Company. Article 10 (Disclaimer of Warranty and Disclaimer) 32. We have a de facto or legal defect in this service (safety, reliability, accuracy, completeness, existence). Efficacy, fitness for a particular purpose, security flaws, errors and bugs, infringement And so on. ) Is not guaranteed, either explicitly or implicitly. 33. We are not responsible for any damage caused to the user due to this service. not. However, the contract between us and the user regarding this service (including this agreement) .. ) Is a consumer contract stipulated in the Consumer Contract Law, this disclaimer does not apply. 34. Even in the case specified in the proviso of the preceding paragraph, the Company shall rely on the Company's negligence (excluding gross negligence). Loss caused by special circumstances among the damage caused to the user due to default or tort Harm (including cases where the Company or the user foresaw or could foresee the occurrence of damage) We do not take any responsibility for. In addition, debt due to our negligence (excluding gross negligence) Compensation for damages caused to the user due to default or tort will be caused by the user. The upper limit is the amount of usage fee received in the month of birth. 35. The Company arises between a user and another user or a third party regarding this service. We are not responsible for any transactions, communications or disputes. Article 11 (Changes in service content, etc.) We will change the contents of this service or provide this service without notifying the user. It can be canceled and we are not responsible for any damage caused to the user by this. not here. Article 12 (Change of Terms of Service) We may change these Terms at any time without notifying the user if we deem it necessary. And can be done. If you start using this service after changing this agreement, please contact us. The user is deemed to have agreed to the changed terms. Article 13 (Handling of personal information) Regarding personal information acquired by using this service, we will refer to our "Privacy Policy". -"Will be handled appropriately.
Article 14 (Notification or Contact) Notification or communication between the user and us shall be made by the method specified by us. This The company is currently registered unless the user notifies the change according to the method specified separately by the company. We consider the contact to be valid and notify or contact the contact, which will be sent to the user when making the call. It is considered to have arrived. Article 15 (Prohibition of transfer of rights and obligations) The user has the status under the usage contract or the right based on this agreement without the prior written consent of our company. Alternatively, the obligation cannot be transferred to a third party or pledged as collateral. Article 16 (Governing law / jurisdiction) 36. In interpreting this agreement, Japanese law shall be the governing law. 37. In the event of a dispute regarding this service, the court having jurisdiction over the location of our head office is exclusive. It will be the agreement jurisdiction.
that's all
